channel.title: Why does everyone call Gordon Freeman "Mr. Freeman"?

item.title: Why does everyone call Gordon Freeman "Mr. Freeman"?
item.dc:creator: mankyman6
item.description:
MarshmallowRadiation:

No. Just… Just no.

“Oh… missesssss G…man, jusssst like that… Not tooooo roughhh now. Mmmmmm jussssst like thaaat.”

few days later

“Honey, I’mmmm pregnnnnant.”

“Ooooh, ssssshhhiit.”

item.source: Why does everyone call Gordon Freeman "Mr. Freeman"?

item.title: Why does everyone call Gordon Freeman "Mr. Freeman"?
item.dc:creator: Spidey1980
item.description:
DrasarSalman:

Is the term “necropost” familiar to you? Does it make any sense for you?

3 weeks hardly constitutes a necropost.

On Topic: No body calls anyone the exact same thing all the time. At work we call my boss “Powel” or “Ms. Powell” but when we all go out for drinks it’s just “Courtney”. And then ofcorse there’s nicknames. Sometimes we call her “CoPo”

In Gordan’s case the writer was trying to fit the mood the NPC is supposed to be feeling toward Gordan. Is the NPC looking down on Gordan (G-Man, like God looking down on mortals, and has Gordan yet proved himself to be an equal to the g-man), or is it just a friendly conversation versus work-related? (beers later versus get in the test chamber NOW!!!)

Read full topic

item.title: Why does everyone call Gordon Freeman "Mr. Freeman"?

item.description:
So every citizen in the HL universe knew Gordon was a doctor because all of (either) them went to MIT and/or worked at Black Mesa.

item.source: Why does everyone call Gordon Freeman "Mr. Freeman"?

item.title: Why does everyone call Gordon Freeman "Mr. Freeman"?
item.dc:creator: Raziel_ZV
item.description:
Flatline:

Um, despite what a lot of people seem to think, the day of the Cascade is NOT Gordon’s first day at work, and I suspect when you work in an underground lab you very quickly get to know everyone. Besides, he’s in a lab coat and a lot of people just assume.

I thought it was because he studied MIT…or something like that …

Read full topic
item.source: Why does everyone call Gordon Freeman "Mr. Freeman"?

item.title: Why does everyone call Gordon Freeman "Mr. Freeman"?
item.dc:creator: Flatline
item.description:
DrasarSalman:

The real question is: How can everyone know that Gordon Freeman is a doctor?

Um, despite what a lot of people seem to think, the day of the Cascade is NOT Gordon’s first day at work, and I suspect when you work in an underground lab you very quickly get to know everyone. Besides, he’s in a lab coat and a lot of people just assume.

Read full topic
